dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 pictorial vignettes: Chasse Ste. Catherine -- Convent de Ste. Catherine.
Shows illustrations of people, animals, and structures.
Shows topography, vegetation, places of historical interest.
"Fig LXXXV" -- top right corner. "T.z" -- bottom left corner.
